price: 32. Kani waa waxa loo yaboohay qof walboo toobad keen badan, dhowra (ballanka iyo wax kastoo Alle u dhoweyn).
arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hādhā mā tūʿadūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓin
